definitions.definition: An intense distressing emotion of fear or repugnance.
Something horrible; that which excites horror.
definitions.example: I saw many horrors during the war.

definitions.definition: Intense dislike or aversion; an abhorrence.
A genre of fiction designed to evoke a feeling of fear and suspense.
An individual work in this genre.
A nasty or ill-behaved person; a rascal or terror.
definitions.example: The neighbour's kids are a pack of little horrors!

definitions.definition: An intense anxiety or a nervous depression; often the horrors.
